resources.string: Blink! \nJust sit back and work \n and i will remind you to blink in every 10 min.
Relax!\n You had enough of work.
We will notify you to blink in every %s min, until you shut it off!
You can not select interval more than 20, well its not good for your eyes.
You can not select interval less than 5, well its not good to loose concentration now and then.
